Key Match Events: Brendan Donovan hit a three-run homer in the third inning
Post-Match Reflections: Brendan Donovan matched a career high in homers and expressed pride in the team's victory
Aaron Boone mentioned Giancarlo Stanton's three-run double as a big swing
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cardinals' first victory at Yankee Stadium since 1964
Ryan Helsley became the first Cardinal to record a save in the Bronx since 1964
